name: Speedrun Timer
description: Just a speedrun timer for platformer levels.

issues.info: Report any issues to my repository!

enabled.name: Enabled
enabled.description: Whether the speedrun timer will appear in-game.

format-minutes.name: Format Minutes
format-minutes.description: Format the timer label to include minutes alongside seconds.

bg-opacity.name: Background Opacity
bg-opacity.description: The opacity of the background behind the timer.

color.name: Timer Color
color.description: The color of the speedrun timer.

color-pause.name: Paused Timer Color
color-pause.description: The color of the speedrun timer when paused.

color-start.name: Disabled Timer Color
color-start.description: The color of the speedrun timer before starting or after stopping.

split-limit.name: Split Limit
split-limit.description: The maximum number of splits that can be created. <co>If more splits are created, the earliest split will be removed.</c>

mobile-btns.name: Mobile Buttons
mobile-btns.description: Show mobile-friendly buttons in-game to control the timer.

mobile-visible-btn.name: Timer Visibility Button
mobile-visible-btn.description: Show a button below the timer button menu to toggle the visibility of the timer and mobile UI.

mobile-opacity.name: Mobile Button Opacity
mobile-opacity.description: The opacity of the mobile buttons.

platformer-only.name: Platformer Only
platformer-only.description: Only allow use of the timer in platformer levels.

checkpoint-split.name: Checkpoint Split
checkpoint-split.description: Create a split when the player activates a checkpoint.
checkpoint-split.enable-if-description: This setting is only available for platformer levels.

reset-death.name: Reset on Death
reset-death.description: Reset the speedrun timer when the player dies. <cy>This feature is currently being worked on.</c>

stop-complete.name: Stop on Complete
stop-complete.description: Stop the speedrun timer when the player completes the level.
